title: Rocking-Horse Winner (Tale Blazers)
features: "Dramascripts" are intended for use in secondary schools, amateur theatrical groups and youth clubs. This play is an adaptation of D.H.Lawrence's "The Rocking-Horse Winner", a moving short story which deals with greed and the dangers of outright materialism.
description: .,."a great resource for teaching the older British writers." -- J.M. Soling
